name: Progress-Ions
description:
Progress-Ions is a layered incremental exploration game currently in development. Explore islands, planets, solar systems and the universe, hire helpers, upgrade your boat, build things, try and balance resources, and much much more!

This is a game in development, and is not even ready to be qualified "early access" yet. If you still want to try it and give comments and suggestions, thank you very much! This is why it's here.
